title: Beef Jerky
ingredients: 2.2pounds (1 kg) beef eye round, frozen for 30 minutes before slicing
directions: 1. Slice the beef against the grain into ¼-inch-thick (6-mm-thick) slices. Combine all the marinade ingredients.
2. Marinate the meat in the mixture for 1 or more days (the longer you marinate, the deeper the flavor).

3. Cook in a warm smoker or a 160°F (70°C) oven for 5 to 8 hours, or dehydrate in a dehydrator set at 140°F (60°C) for 6 to 7½ hours, or until the desired texture is achieved (depends on marbling of the meat and the thickness of the cuts you use).
